summary: Plan scope is missing test coverage for authentication and has no database migration strategy. Two SOP requirements are violated and must be addressed before implementation can begin.

findings.issue: Missing test files for authentication middleware in scope.include
findings.suggestion: Add auth/middleware_test.go to scope.include to satisfy the authentication testing SOP requirement.
findings.evidence: scope.include contains auth/middleware.go but no corresponding auth/middleware_test.go or any test file for the auth package

findings.issue: No database migration plan referenced in scope
findings.suggestion: Add db/migrations/ directory or a specific migration file such as db/migrations/001_initial_schema.sql to scope.include and document the migration strategy in the plan context.
findings.evidence: scope.include lists db/store.go and db/models.go but contains no migration files or migration directory reference
